title: Max et les Ferrailleurs = Max and the Scrap Merchants
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Max et les ferrailleurs' by Claude Neron.
description: Max is a cop obsessed with catching criminals 'in the act'. After a few misfortunes, he turns his attention to small time criminals. Abel, a childhood friend of Max is running a scam with a gang of metal scrappers. Unbeknownst to Abel, Max becomes acquainted with his girlfriend Lily, a prostitute. For Lily, Max becomes Felix, a rich bank manager and a regular client. Slowly, Felix/Max feeds Lily information about his bank in order to incite Abel and his gang to commit a failsafe hit.  Credits: Producers, Ralph Baum, Raymond Danon ; director, Claude Sautet ; writers, Claude Neron, Jean-Loup Dabadie, Claude Sautet ; photography, Rene Mathelin ; music, Philippe Sarde. Cast: Romy Schneider, Michel Piccoli, Bernard Fresson, Francois Perier, Georges Wilson, Bobby Lapointe, Michel Creton, Dany Jacquet, Betty Beckers, Philippe Leotard.
